properties.label: Method
properties.name: method

block.comment: Retrieve list of latest deployments from target environment

block.name: invoke_custom_ruby_code
block.description: Execute ruby code: Get Latest Package Version

input.code:
pipeline_config_id = ""
package_version = ""
deployment_details = input['deployment_details']
latest_deployment = deployment_details.where('pipeline_config_id !=': nil).sort_by {|x| (x[:deployed_on].to_time)}.last

if latest_deployment.present?
  pipeline_config_id = latest_deployment[:pipeline_config_id]
  package_version = latest_deployment[:package_version]
  deployed_on = latest_deployment[:deployed_on]
end

{ pipeline_config_id: pipeline_config_id, package_version: package_version, deployed_on: deployed_on }
input.name: Get Latest Package Version

block.name: call_recipe
block.description: Call CICD | FUNC | List Deployment Details

block.name: invoke_custom_ruby_code
block.description: Execute ruby code: Get Latest Packages

input.code:
pipeline_config_id = ""
package_version = ""
last_version_deployed_to_target = input['last_version_deployed_to_target']
deployment_details = input['deployment_details']

if last_version_deployed_to_target.present?
  packages_list = deployment_details.where('pipeline_config_id !=': nil, 'package_version >': last_version_deployed_to_target).sort_by { |x| x[:package_version] }
else
  packages_list = deployment_details.where('pipeline_config_id !=': nil).sort_by { |x| x[:deployed_on].to_time }
end

latest_deployment = deployment_details.where('pipeline_config_id !=': nil).sort_by { |x| x[:deployed_on].to_time }.last

if latest_deployment.present?
  pipeline_config_id = latest_deployment[:pipeline_config_id]
  package_version = latest_deployment[:package_version]
end

{ packages_list: packages_list, latest_package_version: package_version }
input.name: Get Latest Packages
